name: 李士修
objective:
1. The Electromagnetic Model
2. Vector Analysis
3. Static Electric Fields
4. Solution of Electrostatic Problems
5. Steady Electric Currents
6. Static Magnetic Fields
schedule:
第一週 The Electromagnetic Model
第二、三、四週 Vector Analysis
第五、六、七、八週 Static Electric Fields
第九、十、十一、十二週 Solution of Electrostatic Problems
第十三、十四週 Steady Electric Currents
第十五、十六、十七、十八週 Static Magnetic Fields
scorePolicy:
第一次期中考   30%
第二次期中考   35%
期末考              35%
materials:
主要教科書：
David K. Cheng, Field and Wave Electromagnetics, 2/e
Addison-Wesley Publishing Company, 1989
重要參考書籍：
1. Liang Chi Shen and Jin Au Kong, Applied Electromagnetism, 3/e, PWS.
2. Kraus and Fleisch, Electromagnetics with Applications, 5/e, McGraw-Hill.
3. Fawwaz T. Ulaby, Applied Electromagnetics, Prentice Hall, 2001.
